post.content:
Hi Kyeonghwa (Fred),
We currently have an opportunity open that I believe could be a great match to your skillset.
25376 Technical Lead - Storage Management Applications
Our client is a small company driving a shift to a new class of high performance storage solutions for medium and large enterprises. As part of their growing team they are looking to bring on a Technical Lead for Storage Management Applications. This person will be responsible for providing technical leadership to a team of software designers in the development of a new class of enterprise storage solutions. This successful candidate for this position:
o Participates in establishing product requirement specifications o Independently investigates and proposes solutions to fulfill requirements o Participates in system design activities o Leads and writes system design specifications o Leads a team of software designers in detailed design and implementation o Leads System Integration with teams of software designers o Establishes and leads software engineering and quality practices
Must Haves: Experience in Development, specifically Product Development (> 10 years)
Experience in OO Analysis, Design, and Programming (Java, C++) (5 - 7 years)
Experience in Web 2.0 and management applications (Mandatory)
Experience in client/server architecture (Mandatory)
Experience in enterprise grade applications and/or web applications in a UNIX/Linux environment including: TCP/IP networking, client-server architecture, multi process/thread programming and GUI interface development (Mandatory)
Experience with Storage Management - ISCI, SAN, NAS (Mandatory)
Completion of a Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering/Computer Science (Mandatory)
Nice to Haves: - Experience working on the development of a storage product - Experience in a Team Lead capacity
Entrepreneurial and technology driven company - high energy and fun environment well suited for an enthusiastic person driven to help achieve exciting business solutions
Length: Permanent Salary: Min: $95,000.00 Max: $105,000.00 Approximate start date: ASAP
If you are interested in this opportunity, please fill out an online application or respond directly to this email. I may also be reached by voice mail, however my response time is generally quicker via email.
If you know someone that may be interested please feel free to pass this along to them. Si Systems offers a $500 referral bonus to anyone referred to us not already in our system that we manage to place on contract.
Best regards, Aaron Brown Recruiter Si Systems - Vancouver 604 669-1387 ext.234
We Make the Match!!
post.title: Technical Lead - Storage Management Applications
